==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Punch
|desc_1 = Approaches and swings its fist at the player, dealing '''37.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
|file_1 = Pyro Hilichurl Grenadier Punch

|name_2 = Pyro Slime Throw
|desc_2 = Digs a [[Pyro Slime]] out of the ground, ignites it and throws it at the player, dealing AoE DMG. Staggering the Grenadier during this attack will knock the Pyro Slime out of its hands. A Pyro Slime knocked out of the Grenadier's hands will stay on the ground for a period of time before exploding and dealing AoE DMG.
*The Pyro Slime's explosion deals '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} by default.
*The Pyro Slime is initially infused with {{Pyro}}, and can [[Elemental Reactions|react]] with {{Hydro}}, {{Cryo}}, {{Electro}}, {{Anemo}}, {{Geo}}, as well as cause {{Pyro}} [[Elemental Absorption]]s.
**Triggering Elemental Reactions on the Pyro Slime will extinguish its flames. When extinguished, its explosions deal '''25% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
|file_2 = Pyro Hilichurl Grenadier Pyro Slime Throw
|file_2_2 = Pyro Hilichurl Grenadier Pyro Slime Throw Extinguished
|caption_2_2 = Extinguished
|file_2_3 = Pyro Hilichurl Grenadier Pyro Slime Throw Staggered
|caption_2_3 = Staggered
|file_2_4 = Pyro Hilichurl Grenadier Pyro Slime Throw Failed
|caption_2_4 = Failed
|file_2_5 = Pyro Hilichurl Grenadier Pyro Slime Throw Staggered Explosion
|caption_2_5 = Fallen Slime Explosion
|file_2_6 = Pyro Hilichurl Grenadier Pyro Slime Throw Staggered Explosion Extinguished
|caption_2_6 = Fallen Slime Explosion (Extinguished)

|name_3 = Burning Damage Immunity
|desc_3 = The Hilichurl Grenadier is immune to damage dealt by the [[Burning]] Elemental Reaction (but not the reaction itself) and damage from burning [[grass]].

==Descriptions==
{{Description|The primitive wandering inhabitants of [[Teyvat]]'s wildernesses.<br>These sneaky fellows are skilled in the use of [[Pyro Slime]]s, using them as weapons to attack intruders. Skilled grenadiers may be able to destroy four wooden dummies in a single throw.|[[Archive]]}}

==Trivia==
*They are the only variant of [[Hilichurl Grenadiers]] with the ability to Punch.
